body.name: EverSnug Travel Blanket and Pillow - Premium Soft 2 in 1 Airplane Blanket with Soft Bag Pillowcase, Hand Luggage Sleeve and Backpack Clip (Light Pink)
deliveryMessages: FREE delivery Wednesday, February 21 on orders shipped by Amazon over $35
Or fastest delivery Tomorrow, February 17. Order within 3 hrs 6 mins
features: THE PERFECT TRAVEL COMPANION: Forget thin airline blankets that never keep you warm, the EverSnug Travel Blanket is a lightweight and extra comfy all-season blanket that is the perfect travel companion. At 65” in length and 40” in width the ultra cosy blanket is large enough to keep you and your friend warm. Our patent pending travel blanket is perfect for locations such as the car, plane, airport, camping and many more.

PREMIUM MICRO PLUSH FABRIC: Our carefully crafted Microplush Blanket is ultra soft and lush, you wont want ever take it off! Made with our exclusive premium microfleece yarns, creating a velvety and fuzzy feel that is soft to the touch.
USE IT AS A PILLOW OR A BLANKET: Not only does the travel blanket keep you warm when needed, the Microplush carrying case can also act as the perfect place to rest your head.

ATTACH IT TO YOUR SUITCASE OR BACKPACK: The hand luggage sleeve at the back of the carrying case allows you to easily attach it to your suitcase. The included backpack clip / carabiner allows you to clip the travel blanket to any backpack or your luggage.

THE EVERSNUG PROMISE: We at EverSnug stand behind our products with the greatest confidence that you, our customer will love our products just as much as we do. However, if for any reason you did not fall in love with your product, we have your back by providing a 100% love it or your money back guarantee.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: SUPER SOFT MICRO PLUSH MATERIAL SOFT CARRYING CASE THAT CAN BE USED AS A PILLOW PERFECTLY PORTABLE AND EASILY PACKABLE

CAN BE USED AS A THROW BLANKET AT HOME OR OFFICE This blanket measures 65” x 40”, allowing it to easily fit on your couch as a throw blanket/while watching a movie, while also not taking up a very large amount of couch space or impacting ease of use while travelling. The EverSnug Travel Blanket is a comfortable and cozy blanket, that is a perfect travel companion for you or a gift to your loved ones.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 16, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Perfect! We take it everywhere
reviews.reviewText: We got one for everyone in the fam. Perfect for car rides and flights. Blankets are large, thin, and hold heat in well. So soft and durable.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 23, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great for the price!
reviews.reviewText: The EverSnug Travel Blanket and Pillow are absolute game-changers for long-haul flights, earning a solid five-star rating from my recent journey from the US to Europe and back. The plush and cozy blanket provided the perfect warmth, ensuring a comfortable and restful sleep during the entire flight. Its compact design made it easy to carry, and the included pillow transformed my economy seat into a personal oasis of comfort.What sets the EverSnug Travel Blanket and Pillow apart is their thoughtful design and versatility. The quality of the materials is good, and the compact carrying case made it a breeze to stow away during the trip. Whether I was catching some Zs or simply staying warm while watching in-flight entertainment, this travel set proved to be an essential companion. If you have upcoming travel plans, investing in the EverSnug Travel Blanket and Pillow is a decision you won't regret – a five-star experience that truly enhanced my journey across the Atlantic.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 18, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Excellent Travel Blanket
reviews.reviewText: On a long flight from LAX to Sydney I gave this blanket its first test, and BOY! was I glad that I did. Despite wearing a shirt and sweater, the plane was very chilly after hours of travel. This soft, large, and warm blanket was perfect. It keep me well covered and warm. It is soft and snuggly, which makes it even more of a deal. I highly recommend this item. It is definitely an added bonus that it attaches easily to your backpack or other carryon luggage.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 29, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Comfy, compact and warm!
reviews.reviewText: Perfect for travel and an extra blanket for your bed!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 31, 2023

reviews.reviewText: Great travel blanket, zipper bag easily slides over luggage handle while roll luggage. Compact, sodft and warm. Machine washable. Great price.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 4, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Soaring in Comfort: A Review of the EverSnug Travel Blanket and PillowAh, travel! The thrill of new places, the excitement of adventure... and the dreaded airplane experience. Cold cabins, stiff necks, and flimsy airline blankets – ugh! But fear not, weary traveler, for the EverSnug Travel Blanket and Pillow promises to transform your in-flight woes into cozy clouds of comfort. But does it deliver on its lofty promises, or is it just another overpriced airport souvenir? Let's buckle up and take this 2-in-1 wonder for a flight review!First Impressions:The EverSnug arrives neatly folded in a compact carrying pouch that doubles as a pillowcase. This space-saving design is a win for carry-on minimalists. Unfurled, the blanket reveals a generous size (65" x 40") and a luxuriously soft feel. The plush fleece lining promises warmth and comfort, while the outer layer exudes a sleek, travel-ready vibe.Image of EverSnug Travel Blanket and PillowOpens in a new windowwww.amazon.comEverSnug Travel Blanket and PillowComfort in the Clouds:The true test of any travel blanket is its ability to combat chilly cabins and fight off in-flight shivers. And the EverSnug delivers! The plush fleece lining is incredibly cozy, keeping you warm without feeling heavy or stifling. Plus, the generous size allows you to snuggle in completely, creating your own personal oasis of comfort amidst the cramped airplane seats.Pillow Power:The integrated pillow is a game-changer for neck-sore sufferers. The soft filling and adjustable drawstring offer customizable support, allowing you to find the perfect position for a nap or movie marathon. No more contorting your neck around flimsy airline pillows – the EverSnug cradles your head in sweet, sweet travel bliss.Versatility Takes Flight:The EverSnug isn't just for airplanes! This versatile duo can be your cozy companion on trains, buses, road trips, even picnics in the park. The compact size and carrying pouch make it easy to stash in your bag, ready to conquer any chilly adventure.A Few Turbulence Bumps:Some reviewers mention the fleece shedding a bit initially, so a pre-flight fluff session might be recommended. Additionally, the integrated pillow might be a bit too bulky for some prefer a flatter travel pillow option.The Verdict:The EverSnug Travel Blanket and Pillow is a cozy upgrade for any frequent flier (or occasional adventurer). Its luxurious feel, generous size, and integrated pillow offer undeniable comfort and versatility, making it a worthwhile investment for combating travel woes. While there might be a few minor quibbles about shedding and pillow bulk, the overall package of comfort and convenience makes the EverSnug a champion in the world of travel essentials.Overall Rating: 4 out of 5 starsSo, ditch the flimsy airline blankets and embrace the comfort revolution! The EverSnug Travel Blanket and Pillow is your ticket to cozy skies and restful journeys. Just remember, pack your pre-flight fluff brush and enjoy the sweet dreams (and warm snuggles) that await!I hope this review helps you decide if the EverSnug Travel Blanket and Pillow is the perfect upgrade for your next adventure! Happy travels!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 20, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Super Soft and Extremely Convenient
reviews.reviewText: I want to start off by saying when I received the product I had a super small issue. However, I contacted the company directly and they immediately rectified it. The costumer service and speed of response was phenomenal. The product itself is beautiful, Soft, & extremely convenient. I recently bought this for a 8 1/2 hour plane ride… And I loved it so much that I also used it in my hotel room. It is soft and warm but I also love the fact that it brings its own bag to carry it in that can easily be clipped to a suitcase or backpack, the versatility is also very nice because it can be used as a pillow when packed in its bag. On my plane, there was another girl who had one in a different color and we both raved about how amazing it is!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 9, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great Travel Blanket
reviews.reviewText: I love this blanket! A blanket is a must for me on red-eye flights, and this one is so easy to travel with. It's soft, a great size, and can clip onto the outside of your carry-on bag. I love that folds up so compact, but is still a nice size for me to sleep with on the plane. I don't travel without it.

Perfect pillow or blanket option for your travels. Fabric is soft and cozy. Size of blanket is good for an small-average size adult.You can use as a pillow or blanket, but not both at same time.Perfect for the car too!

Me sirvio muchisimo para un viaje largo, incluso use la cobija para taparme en el hotel o ponerla como sabana en las camas.Esta muy comodo y es muy suave. Ya la lave y no se hizo fea ni solto pelusa. Lo recomiendo.
Me encanto!! Compré para mi y volví a comprar otra para regalo, esta súper suave y tiene una buena medida, la mega recomiendo!
Doux, petit, leger, cosy, taille idéale pour 1 pers

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on July 26, 2023
reviews.reviewText: I am a frequent flyer, and use to use a U shaped neck pillow. This is far superior, a lovely sift comfy pillow, and with the carabiner clip and luggage handle slip its easy to attach to your luggage. The blanket is very lightweight while still being a good size, and very warm, and easy to fold back into it's pouch.EXTRA TIP - if you turn the travel bag inside out and zip round, it makes a lovely fleecy warm pouch for your feet!!!
